title: How to Make a Turbo Sandwich

steps.headline: Get one more slice of bread and grill it.
Cook 4 bacon strips until they are cooked but still tender
Place them on the grilled bread
On top of the bacon add a slice of cheese
On top of the cheese add a breaded chicken breast
Put the last grilled slice on top.

text: Get a slice of bread  Add butter  Grill the slice of bread  Get another slice of bread  Toast it  Add mayo to both sides  Get one more slice of bread and grill it.  Cook 4 bacon strips until they are cooked but still tender  Place them on the grilled bread  On top of the bacon add a slice of cheese  On top of the cheese add a breaded chicken breast  Add the toasted slice  Add Lettuce and tomato  Put the last grilled slice on top.  Finished.
